tools.name: Get-LinuxInventory
tools.description: Lists all registered Linux servers from the Active Directory OU.

OutputPath.description: If specified, generates an HTML dashboard report at this file path.

Online.description:
Ping each server to determine online/offline status. Adds an Online property
(True/False) and ResponseTime (ms) to the output.

OrganizationalUnit.description: OU to query. Defaults to "OU=Linux Servers" under the domain root.

tools.name: Import-LinuxInventory
tools.description: Bulk imports Linux servers into Active Directory from a CSV file.

Force.description: Overwrite existing computer objects if they already exist.

CsvPath.description: Path to the CSV file. The file must exist and have .csv extension.

OrganizationalUnit.description:
Target OU for all imported servers. Defaults to "OU=Linux Servers" under the
domain root.

tools.name: Register-LinuxServer
tools.description: Creates a computer object in Active Directory for a Linux server.

Name.description: The hostname of the Linux server (used as the AD computer name).

ManagedBy.description: Distinguished name or SAMAccountName of the user who manages this server.

OrganizationalUnit.description:
Target OU for the computer object. Defaults to "OU=Linux Servers" under the
domain root. Provide a full distinguished name for a specific location.

IPAddress.description: The IPv4 address of the server.

Description.description: Optional description for the computer object.

Force.description: Overwrite the existing computer object if one already exists with the same name.

OperatingSystem.description: The OS name stored in the OperatingSystem attribute. Defaults to "Linux".

tools.name: Sync-LinuxInventory
tools.description: Pings all registered Linux servers and reports their online/offline status.

UpdateDescription.description:
When specified, appends a timestamp tag to the AD description:
- Online:  "[Last Seen: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm]"
- Offline: "[OFFLINE since: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm]"

OrganizationalUnit.description: OU to query. Defaults to "OU=Linux Servers" under the domain root.

TimeoutMs.description: Ping timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to 1000.

tools.name: Update-LinuxServer
tools.description: Updates properties of an existing Linux server entry in Active Directory.

Name.description: The hostname of the Linux server to update. Accepts pipeline input.

ManagedBy.description: Distinguished name or SAMAccountName of the new manager.

OrganizationalUnit.description:
OU where the server resides. Used to scope the lookup. Defaults to
"OU=Linux Servers" under the domain root.

IPAddress.description: New IPv4 address for the server.
